categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Enver Hoxha was a male Jedi Padawan during the Clone Wars, stationed at the Jedi Temple. During the Jedi Temple Apprentice Tournament he was pitted against Pirt Neer in the eighth round. While their duel in the refectory drew a lot of attention, it was cut short when Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy took his lightsaber. He tapped out when Neer held her lightsaber to his neck.
The character shares his name with the real-life former Communist head of state of Albania.
